mapper.select: select ic.interesting_company_id, ic.member_id, ic.business_id, b.business_location, b.business_category, b.business_company_name, bb.board_business_id, bb.board_business_title, bb.board_business_register_date, bb.board_business_update_date, bb.board_business_status, bbi.board_business_img_original_name, bbi.board_business_img_uuid, bbi.board_business_img_path from tbl_interesting_company ic left join tbl_business b on ic.business_id = b.business_id left join tbl_board_business bb on ic.business_id = bb.business_id left join tbl_board_business_img bbi on bb.board_business_id = bbi.board_business_id where bb.board_business_status = 1 order by bb.board_business_id desc
